36namespace bitpit {
37
38struct KSPOptions {
39 PetscInt restart;
40 PetscInt maxits;
41 PetscScalar rtol;
42 PetscScalar atol;
43
44 PetscInt overlap;
45 PetscInt levels;
46
47 PetscInt sublevels;
48 PetscScalar subrtol;
49
50 KSPOptions()
51 : restart(PETSC_DEFAULT), maxits(PETSC_DEFAULT),
52 rtol(PETSC_DEFAULT), atol(PETSC_DEFAULT),
53 overlap(PETSC_DEFAULT), levels(PETSC_DEFAULT),
54 sublevels(PETSC_DEFAULT), subrtol(PETSC_DEFAULT)
55 {
56 }
57};
58
59struct KSPStatus {
60 PetscErrorCode error;
61 PetscInt its;
62 KSPConvergedReason convergence;
63
64 KSPStatus()
65 : error(0), its(-1), convergence(KSP_DIVERGED_BREAKDOWN)
66 {
67 }
68};
69
70class SystemMatrixOrdering
71{
72
73public:
74 virtual ~SystemMatrixOrdering() = default;
75
85 virtual long getRowRank(long row) const = 0;
86
96 virtual long getColRank(long col) const = 0;
97
98protected:
99 SystemMatrixOrdering() = default;
100
101};
102
103class NaturalSystemMatrixOrdering : public SystemMatrixOrdering
104{
105
106public:
107 NaturalSystemMatrixOrdering() = default;
108
109 long getRowRank(long row) const override;
110 long getColRank(long col) const override;
111
112};
113
114template<typename RowRankStorage, typename ColRankStorage>
115class ProxySystemMatrixOrdering : public SystemMatrixOrdering
116{
117
118public:
119 ProxySystemMatrixOrdering(const RowRankStorage *rowRankStorage, const ColRankStorage *colRankStorage);
120
121 long getRowRank(long row) const override;
122 long getColRank(long col) const override;
123
124private:
125 const RowRankStorage *m_rowRankStorage;
126 const ColRankStorage *m_colRankStorage;
127
128};
129
130class SystemMatrixAssembler {
131
132public:
133 struct AssemblyOptions {
134 bool full;
135 bool sorted;
136 };
137
138 virtual ~SystemMatrixAssembler() = default;
139
140 virtual AssemblyOptions getOptions() const = 0;
141
142 virtual int getBlockSize() const = 0;
143
144 virtual long getRowCount() const = 0;
145 virtual long getColCount() const = 0;
146
147 virtual long getRowElementCount() const = 0;
148 virtual long getColElementCount() const = 0;
149
150#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
151 virtual long getRowGlobalCount() const = 0;
152 virtual long getColGlobalCount() const = 0;
153
154 virtual long getRowGlobalElementCount() const = 0;
155 virtual long getColGlobalElementCount() const = 0;
156
157 virtual long getRowGlobalOffset() const = 0;
158 virtual long getColGlobalOffset() const = 0;
159
160 virtual long getRowGlobalElementOffset() const = 0;
161 virtual long getColGlobalElementOffset() const = 0;
162#endif
163
164 virtual long getRowNZCount(long rowIndex) const = 0;
165 virtual long getMaxRowNZCount() const = 0;
166
167 virtual void getRowPattern(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern) const = 0;
168 virtual void getRowValues(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const = 0;
169 virtual void getRowData(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const = 0;
170
171protected:
172 SystemMatrixAssembler() = default;
173
174};
175
176class SystemSparseMatrixAssembler : public SystemMatrixAssembler {
177
178public:
179 SystemSparseMatrixAssembler(const SparseMatrix *matrix);
180
181 AssemblyOptions getOptions() const override;
182
183 int getBlockSize() const override;
184
185 long getRowCount() const override;
186 long getColCount() const override;
187
188 long getRowElementCount() const override;
189 long getColElementCount() const override;
190
191#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
192 long getRowGlobalCount() const override;
193 long getColGlobalCount() const override;
194
195 long getRowGlobalElementCount() const override;
196 long getColGlobalElementCount() const override;
197
198 long getRowGlobalOffset() const override;
199 long getColGlobalOffset() const override;
200
201 long getRowGlobalElementOffset() const override;
202 long getColGlobalElementOffset() const override;
203#endif
204
205 long getRowNZCount(long rowIndex) const override;
206 long getMaxRowNZCount() const override;
207
208 void getRowPattern(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern) const override;
209 void getRowValues(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const override;
210 void getRowData(long rowIndex, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const override;
211
212protected:
213 const SparseMatrix *m_matrix;
214
215};

218
219public:

221
222 virtual ~PetscManager();
223
224 bool areOptionsEditable() const;
225
226 bool initialize(bool debug);
227 bool finalize();
228
229 void addInitOption(const std::string &option);
230 void addInitOptions(int argc, char **args);
231 void addInitOptions(const std::vector<std::string> &options);
232 void clearInitOptions();
233
234private:
235 static PetscErrorCode displayLogView();
236
237 bool m_externalMPIInitialization;
238 bool m_externalPETScInitialization;
239
240 bool m_optionsEditable;
241 std::vector<std::string> m_options;
242
243 bool m_logViewEnabled;
244
245 void enableLogView();
246
247};

249class SystemSolver {
250
251public:
252 enum FileFormat {
253 FILE_BINARY,
254 FILE_ASCII
255 };
256
257 SystemSolver(bool debug = false);
258 SystemSolver(bool transpose, bool debug);
259 SystemSolver(bool flatten, bool transpose, bool debug);
260 SystemSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool debug = false);
261 SystemSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool transpose, bool debug);
262 SystemSolver(const std::string &prefix, bool flatten, bool transpose, bool debug);
263
264 virtual ~SystemSolver();
265
266 void clear();
267 void clearWorkspace();
268
269 void assembly(const SparseMatrix &matrix);
270 void assembly(const SparseMatrix &matrix, const SystemMatrixOrdering &reordering);
271#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
272 void assembly(MPI_Comm communicator, bool isPartitioned, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
273 void assembly(MPI_Comm communicator, bool isPartitioned, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler, const SystemMatrixOrdering &reordering);
274#else
275 void assembly(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
276 void assembly(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler, const SystemMatrixOrdering &reordering);
277#endif
278 bool isAssembled() const;
279
280 void update(const SparseMatrix &elements);
281 void update(long nRows, const long *rows, const SparseMatrix &elements);
282 void update(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
283 void update(long nRows, const long *rows, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
284
285 BITPIT_DEPRECATED(void setUp());
286 BITPIT_DEPRECATED(bool isSetUp() const);
287
288 bool getTranspose() const;
289 void setTranspose(bool transpose);
290
291 int getBlockSize() const;
292
293 long getRowCount() const;
294 long getColCount() const;
295 long getRowElementCount() const;
296 long getColElementCount() const;
297#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
298 long getRowGlobalCount() const;
299 long getColGlobalCount() const;
300 long getRowGlobalElementCount() const;
301 long getColGlobalElementCount() const;
302
303 bool isPartitioned() const;
304#endif
305
306 void solve();
307 void solve(const std::vector<double> &rhs, std::vector<double> *solution);
308
309 void dumpSystem(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix = "") const;
310#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
311 void restoreSystem(MPI_Comm communicator, const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix = "");
312#else
313 void restoreSystem(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix = "");
314#endif
315
316 void exportMatrix(const std::string &filePath, FileFormat exportFormat = FILE_BINARY) const;
317 void exportRHS(const std::string &filePath, FileFormat exportFormat = FILE_BINARY) const;
318 void exportSolution(const std::string &filePath, FileFormat exportFormat = FILE_BINARY) const;
319
320 virtual void setNullSpace();
321 void unsetNullSpace();
322
323 KSPOptions & getKSPOptions();
324 const KSPOptions & getKSPOptions() const;
325 const KSPStatus & getKSPStatus() const;
326
327 double * getRHSRawPtr();
328 const double * getRHSRawPtr() const;
329 const double * getRHSRawReadPtr() const;
330 void restoreRHSRawPtr(double *raw_rhs);
331 void restoreRHSRawReadPtr(const double *raw_rhs) const;
332 void fillRHS(const std::string &filePath);
333
334 double * getSolutionRawPtr();
335 const double * getSolutionRawPtr() const;
336 const double * getSolutionRawReadPtr() const;
337 void restoreSolutionRawPtr(double *raw_solution);
338 void restoreSolutionRawReadPtr(const double *raw_solution) const;
339 void fillSolution(const std::string &filePath);
340
341 bool isForceConsistencyEnabled() const;
342 void enableForceConsistency(bool enable);
343
344protected:
345 bool m_flatten;
346 bool m_transpose;
347
348 Mat m_A;
349 Vec m_rhs;
350 Vec m_solution;
351
352 KSP m_KSP;
353 KSPOptions m_KSPOptions;
354 KSPStatus m_KSPStatus;
355
356 void matrixCreate(int blockSize);
357 void matrixCreate(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
358 void matrixFill(const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
359 void matrixFill(const std::string &filePath);
360 void matrixDestroy();
361 void matrixUpdate(long nRows, const long *rows, const SystemMatrixAssembler &assembler);
362
363 void vectorsCreate();
364 void vectorsReorder(bool invert);
365 void vectorsFill(const std::vector<double> &rhs, std::vector<double> *solution);
366 void vectorsFill(const std::string &rhsFilePath, const std::string &solutionFilePath);
367 void vectorsDestroy();
368 void vectorsExport(std::vector<double> *solution);
369
370 void clearReordering();
371 void setReordering(long nRows, long nCols, const SystemMatrixOrdering &reordering);
372
373 void prepareKSP();
374 void finalizeKSP();
375 void createKSP();
376 void destroyKSP();
377
378 virtual void preKSPSetupActions();
379 virtual void postKSPSetupActions();
380
381 virtual void preKSPSolveActions();
382 virtual void postKSPSolveActions();
383
384 std::string getInfoFilePath(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix) const;
385 std::string getMatrixFilePath(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix) const;
386 std::string getRHSFilePath(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix) const;
387 std::string getSolutionFilePath(const std::string &directory, const std::string &prefix) const;
388
389#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
390 const MPI_Comm & getCommunicator() const;
391#endif
392
393private:
394 static PetscManager m_petscManager;
395
396 static int m_nInstances;
397
398 std::string m_prefix;
399
400 bool m_assembled;
401
402 bool m_KSPDirty;
403
404#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
405 MPI_Comm m_communicator;
406
407 bool m_partitioned;
408#endif
409
410 IS m_rowReordering;
411 IS m_colReordering;
412
413 bool m_forceConsistency;
414
415#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
416 void setCommunicator(MPI_Comm communicator);
417 void freeCommunicator();
418#endif
419
420 void resetPermutations();
421
422 void removeNullSpaceFromRHS();
423
424};
